item.title: Moving to GitHub Pages, Pt.2
item.author: Author
item.description: Further on Hosting Stuff with GitHub Pages Let’s repeat my ToDo list of the last blog post here and see where we are: create blog locally add content setup github pages add github action to auto deploy update DNS zone enable comments enable share links add meaningful content Not too bad? But how did we arrive here? Hosting under custom domain In theory that’s quite easy. Once you have GitHub Pages set up your page will already be available as username.
